Careers

Accelerate your drug discovery with in silico solutions.

Aganitha partners with global biopharma to accelerate research and development through in silico based bioinformatics solutions leveraging Cloud, Data, Analytics, DevOps, and AI/ML.

Biopharma companies are witnessing innovation paths expanding from small molecules, natural & recombinant biologicals to targeted cell, gene & advanced therapies.

The biopharma industry is in the early stages of a dramatic transformation in how it operates, from drug discovery to clinical trials to clinical operations.This transformation is happening in three key areas: research and development, clinical trials, and clinical operations. The core drivers continue to be reducing timelines for drug discovery and increasing the accuracy of predictions on drug efficacy & safety.

Enabling computational transformation of the biopharma industry

Our solutions enable biopharma R&D and IT to efficiently tackle the complexity, scale, and richness of modern R&D and clinical domains. They are built on the following enablers that deliver valuable outcomes and significantly enhance the pace of innovation.

Data as an R&D Asset

Organize and enrich enterprise data in an easy to consume format for scientists helping them increase research productivity and speed of strategic decision making.

High throughput automation

Provide quick insights by intertwining analytics and AI in conjunction with high throughput automation helping reduce cycle times and drive efficiencies.

Contextualized in silico models

Enable a virtuous round-tripping cycle between in silico and in vitro experiments by developing customer specific models blending advances in biology, chemistry, and computing.

High concentration biological design

Characterize high concentration samples to maximize the efficiency of screening, while minimizing the total amount of samples required for analysis using in silico models.

Quantum chemical descriptors

Predict low yielding reactions and enable accurate predictions of activation energy with quantum chemical descriptors with machine learning while decreasing avoidable experiment expenditure.

R&D platform tools in a box

Simplify setting up the in silico computing platform and artificial intelligence building blocks that complement the traditional lab-based approaches across drug research and development activities.

Why Aganitha?

Leverage our experience and strengths to build transformational solutions in Biopharma

Client confidence

We make it easy for clients to engage with us in different types of projects from custom to accelerator-led development services while ensuring that they retain the Intellectual Property Rights (IPR) and molecule licenses.

Agile + enterprise-grade

Our leadership team is hands-on and brings the required variety and blend of expertise, experience, and management nuances: start-up + enterprise mindset, technology + domain skills, and small + large team incubation and scaling of teams.

Multi-domain skills

We have built a strong multi-domain team that combines their expertise in Biology, Chemistry, AI/ML, DevOps, Cloud to build valuable solutions for our customers.

Deep focus

We are deeply focused and invested in the biopharma industry continually developing solutions, frameworks, and building blocks across the drug research & development value chain

Solutions foundation

We bring a design driven approach to building solutions, leverage DevOps for automating computing processes, and cloud infrastructure for resource intensive computing. Aganitha’s reference architecture and computational infrastructure enables us to build high quality solutions quickly.

Client teams - research + IT

We are proficient at working with leaders and practitioners in both research and IT divisions of biopharma companies while ensuring that role and department specific objectives are met with technology, domain, and management approaches. In addition to being receptive to customer goals, we also take initiative to address any latent needs.
